pages.text: Mortar is a processing device that can grind things. It is primarily for grinding ingredients into paste form. It can also refine crude salt into regular table salt. $(br)To use mortar, firstly place it down as a block. Right click the mortar block with items being held will put items into mortar. Right click with empty hand will let it work; after right-clicking for several
times, the products will automatically pop out. $(br2)You can break mortar block with bare hands.

Mortar can hold exactly one bucket of water, as if it is vanilla bucket. To fill in water, simply right click water source with empty mortar held in your hand. You cannot place mortar with water on the ground. You cannot pour the water out, either.
